Address.label: Address
Address.value: 6 LIBERTY LANE WEST, HAMPTON, New Hampshire, 03842-1720, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Unitil Corp is a holding company, through its subsidiaries it is engaged in the local distribution of electricity and natural gas throughout its service territories in the states of New Hampshire, Massachusetts, and Maine. It reports three segments namely utility gas operations, utility electric operations, and non-regulated.
